column5: I enjoy seeing muskie pics and I think more than a few members here like them as well. There have been some beauties posted in the last little while. Marc Thorpe has just finished his 2013 season so here are a few of his guests fish from this season. There are 3 links below.  https://www.facebook.com/home.php#!/media/set/?set=a.375893789223027.1073741844.365770416902031&type=1 https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=554768231276844&set=a.170916179662053.45234.100002310155719&type=1&theater  https://www.facebook.com/?ref=tn_tnmn#!/PeteMaina
Some nice fish there Roy, but it's not surprising, Marc's always on the bigguns.
Some real beauties there.  Marc sure knows where they live!

Ya been a pretty good year,not sure I always know where they liveBut they sure do find me,dont mind them catching me Have not had time to post,Life kinda catches up to you,kids grown,mocing into houses and getting their lives going. Lots know how that goes  Drop by every so often and look at post,monster caught from Nip I saw,Gorilla is my thought
Caught much of the pics on Facebook.  As always Marc, you've got 'em dialed in and I'm sure your clients appreciate that.  Solid season Mr.
